br.com.caelum.vraptor.interceptor.multipart

Class CommonsUploadMultipartInterceptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.caelum.vraptor.interceptor.multipart.CommonsUploadMultipartInterceptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Interceptor, MultipartInterceptor

    @Intercepts(before=ResourceLookupInterceptor.class,
            after={})
@RequestScoped
public class CommonsUploadMultipartInterceptor
extends java.lang.Object
implements MultipartInterceptor
    A multipart interceptor based on Apache Commons Upload. Provided parameters are injected through RequestParameters.set and uploaded files are made available through
    Author:
    Guilherme Silveira, Ot√°vio Scherer Garcia

      • reportSizeLimitExceeded

        protected void reportSizeLimitExceeded(org.apache.commons.fileupload.FileUploadBase.SizeLimitExceededException e)
        This method is called when the FileUploadBase.SizeLimitExceededException was thrown. By default, add the key file.limit.exceeded using Validations.
